net.cnri.apps.doserver

Class SetupHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.apps.doserver.SetupHelper

  • public class SetupHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs a server object that accepts and handles incoming requests for operations on digital objects. Agents in an embedded knowbot service station are used to determine access control as well as to perform operations on objects in the server.

      • getInteger

        public int getInteger(java.lang.String prompt,
                      int defaultAnswer,
                      int minimum,
                      int maximum)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Prompt the user for a positive integer (within specified limits, if any). No default is provided the user if defaultAnswer is NO_DEFAULT. No minimum enforcement if minimum is NO_LIMIT. No maximum enforcement if maximum is NO_LIMIT.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
